quotes.quote: It's not the face that makes someone a monster, it's the choices they make with their lives.
The world isn't perfect. But it's there for us, doing the best it can. That's what makes it so damn beautiful.
If you don't take risks, you can't create a future.
Hard work is what makes your dreams come true.
The moment you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.
A person grows up when he's able to overcome hardships. Protection is important, but there are some things that a person must learn on his own.
Even if we forget the faces of our friends, we will never forget the bonds that were carved into our souls.
Power comes in response to a need, not a desire.
The ticket to the future is always open.
I am the hope of the universe. I am the answer to all living things that cry out for peace.
If you really want to be strong, stop caring about what your surrounding thinks of you.
The true measure of a shinobi is not how he lives but how he dies.
I don't want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean is the Pirate King.
Mankind's greatest scientific discovery may be its ability to choose.
Fear is not evil. It tells you what weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger as well as kinder.
We are all like fireworks: we climb, we shine and always go our separate ways and become further apart.
Being weak is nothing to be ashamed of. Staying weak is.
I'll leave tomorrow's problems to tomorrow's me.
The past makes you wanna die out of regret and the future makes you depressed out of anxiety. So by elimination, the present is likely the happiest time.
If you don't share someone's pain, you can never understand them.

quote: People's lives don't end when they die. It ends when they lose faith.
You should enjoy the little detours to the fullest. Because that's where you'll find the things more important than what you want.
I refuse to let my fear control me anymore.
The world is not beautiful, therefore it is.
Sometimes I do feel like I'm a failure. Like there's no hope for me. But even so, I'm not gonna give up. Ever!
If you wanna make people dream, you've gotta start by believing in that dream yourself.
Life is not a game of luck. If you wanna win, work hard.
When you hit the point of no return, that's the moment it truly becomes a voyage of discovery.
source: A Place Further Than the Universe

quote: I want to be needed by someone. I want to be that someone's number one.
The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed.
Reject common sense to make the impossible possible.
I am not alone. Do you hear me? I am not alone!
The fake is of far greater value. In its deliberate attempt to be real, it's more real than the real thing.
I'll never give up! That's my ninja way!
A dropout will beat a genius through hard work.
If you begin to regret, you'll dull your future decisions and let others make your choices for you.
We have to live life to the fullest and never forget to smile.
I don't know everything, I just know what I know.
Even if I die, you keep living okay? Live to see what the end of your story brings.
I'll make my own future.
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it.
I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That's my nind≈ç: my ninja way.
Whatever you lose, you'll find it again. But what you throw away you'll never get back.
I want to become stronger. I want to become so strong that when people look at me, they'll think 'That person looks really strong.'
The moment you find the courage to give up your life for someone would be the moment you understand love.
I don't want to survive. I want to live.
If you really want to be strong, stop caring about what your surrounding thinks of you.
A place where someone still thinks about you is a place you can call home.
I'll become so strong that my name will be remembered throughout history.
Dreams don't have deadlines.
If you don't take risks, you can't create a future.
I am who I am today because I had friends who accepted me for who I am.
The difference between the novice and the master is that the master has failed more times than the novice has tried.
I'll surpass you. That's a promise!
Being alone is better than being with the wrong person.
I want to be useful to someone. I want to be that someone's number one.
If you can't do something, then don't. Focus on what you can do.
I'll become the Pirate King!
The strong should aid and protect the weak. Then, the weak will become strong, and they will aid and protect those weaker than them.
I'm not gonna die, my friends still need me!
If you don't have confidence in yourself, who will?
I'll protect everyone, no matter what!
The only way to truly escape the mundane is for you to constantly be evolving.
I refuse to let my fear control me anymore.
I'll become stronger for everyone who believes in me.
If you really want something, you have to be willing to fight for it.
I don't want to be a hero. Heroes share their meat, and I want all the meat!
The world's not perfect, but it's there for us trying the best it can. That's what makes it so damn beautiful.
I'll show you that effort can surpass genius!
I want to become stronger than anyone.
I'll become the world's greatest swordsman!
I want to see what's beyond that door.
I'll never forgive anyone who hurts my friends!
I'll become stronger than my father!
